name: WEN 6010 6-Inch Waxer/Polisher
short_description: High performance 120 V, 0.5 amp permanent magnet motor
3500 rpm
Ergonomically contoured palm and body-grip design for comfortable 1 or 2 hand use
Lockable ON/OFF Switch
Includes a 6-inch applicator bonnet and a 6-inch terry cloth bonnet
product_description: Remember when a polished car was the sign of a hard work ethic? Give your car the love it deserves with the WEN 6-inch Random Orbital Waxer. The ergonomically contoured palm and body grip increases accuracy and control while the random orbital technology provides a streak-free shine to the finish of your car. Why put your trust in those other waxers? WEN invented random orbital technology decades ago and has been perfecting the complexities and idiosyncrasies of the waxer ever since. Now, years later, we come to you with the durable and affordable 6-inch waxer and polisher. Delicate enough for any paint job or finish; powerful enough for any stain or blemish. Just grab your favorite wax and hit the driveway. No car? No problem. The WEN 6-inch random orbital waxer works great for all types of surfaces; from the garage to the kitchen to the bathroom to the banister. Vanquish any unwanted dirt or grime from your life, leaving nothing behind but a clean and reflective shine. What else could you ask for? Make your car the talk of the town with the WEN 6-inch waxer and polisher.

name: Cordless Buffer Polisher for Car Detailing,7230 RPM Car Buffer Polisher,21V 4.0Ah Li-ion Battery,Cordless Polisher With 29 PCS Car Detailing Kit,for Polishing, Waxing, Boat Sanding, Scratch Removing
short_description: 【Powerful Brushless Motor】-The car buffer equipped with a high-efficiency pure copper brushless motor, this car polisher delivers 900W of power and reaches speeds up to 7230 RPM. Its built-in buffer overload protection instantly cuts off power when excess pressure is applied, preventing damage to the paint and ensuring user safety. The car polisher also provides exceptional durability, precise speed control, outstanding stability.

【4.0Ah Battery & Fast Charging】-The cordless buffer polisher included 2 * 21V 4.0Ah large-capacity batteries, offering enough power to complete a full car polishing session. With the accompanying fast charger, each battery full recharges in just 90 minutes. Swapping between two batteries significantly extends runtime and eliminates power anxiety.Note: The battery may lose some charge during transit; please fully charge it prior to use.

【6-Speed Adjustment & DIY 】-This car buffers and polishers kit features 6 adjustable speed settings: low speed (Gear 1-2, 800–1000 RPM) for waxing and polishing; medium speed (Gear 2-3, 1000–3000 RPM) for polishing and cleaning; high speed (Gear 3-4, 3000–4600 RPM) for effectively removing paint defects and oxidation; and ultra-high speed (Gear 5-6, 6500–7230 RPM) for DIY cutting and grinding (not recommended for non-professionals).

【Portable Design & Dual Speed Control】-The car buffer polisher weighing only 4 lbs, the car buffer adopting rubber coating anti slip design for comfort and secure handling. The cordless design eliminates tangled cables. It supports two control modes,button (1/2/4/6) and knob (1-6),which can’t be used simultaneously. Must turn off the switch and wait for the controller light to turn off before switching control modes. The car buffer polisher compatible with 125mm/150mm/180mm discs.

【Wide Application】-The buffer polisher designed for both professionals and beginners, the car buffers and polishers kit comes with three types of pads (flat foam and wavy foam pads; wool polishing pad) and 2000-grit sandpaper. It is suitable for polishing, swirl removal, scratch repair, and more on painted surfaces.The cordless buffer polisher accommodates various tasks including auto, boat sanding, furniture refinishing, and floor maintenance,meet your polishing needs in different scenarios.

【29 Pack Car Buffers and Polishers Kit】-The orbital polisher for cars includes 28 specially designed accessories: 1*cordless buffer polisher, 3*flat foam pads, 3*wave foam pads, 3*wool polishing pads, 10*sheets of 2000-grit sandpaper, 1*5 inch backing plate, 2*21V 4.0Ah batteries, 1*fast charger, 1*side handle, 1*U-shaped handle and 2*handle screws, 1*hex screwdriver.

name: LDHTHOPI Buffer Polisher, 1600W 7 Inch/6 Inch Rotary Buffer Polisher Waxer, 7 Variable Speed 1000-3500 RPM, Detachable Handle for Car, Boat Sanding, Polishing, Waxing
short_description: 【High Performance】: LDHTHOPI buffer polisher is equipped with a high-performance 1600W motor, ensuring efficient and durable operation. The powerful motor delivers consistent performance, making it capable of handling tough tasks like removing oxidation, scratches, and stains from car surfaces.

【7 Variable Speeds】: With 7 adjustable speeds ranging from 1000 to 3500 RPM, this polisher offers flexibility for a wide range of tasks. The speed settings are ideal for different materials and applications, from delicate sanding to aggressive polishing.

【3 Use Methods】: The polisher is designed with user comfort in mind. It can be used in three different ways: directly, with D-handle, or with side handle, ensuring maximum comfort and control during extended use.

【7 Kinds of Pads】: It comes with a variety of different pads for different needs.Wool/orange/black pads effectively remove deep scratches, oxidation, and stubborn stains; yellow/red polishing pads are perfect for touching up and enhancing the shine of your car's paint; and green/blue polishing pads are great for removing light swirls and fine scratches for a flawless body finish.

【Multi-Surface Use】：This 7 inch buffer is not just for car detailing. It can be used on a variety of surfaces, including furniture, floors, boats, marble, wood, and metal, saving you time and money.(Please note: when using the polishing machine, do not use too much pressure on the head to avoid overloading/A single working time should not exceed 15 minutes, after more than 15 minutes, please stop cooling for 5 minutes before continuing, so as not to overheat the motor)
